00219 /*
00220  * Check the native byte-ordering of the machine by writing a magic
00221  * number to a temporary file and reading it back.  * Return value:
00222  * 0 if BIG-ENDIAN, 1 if LITTLE-ENDIAN, -1 if error.  
00223  */
